currentDoc: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.

 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we al

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning.  We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. T

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter.  We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning.  The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were prod

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.

I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing.

 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing.  We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing.  We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.

I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we al

There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instinc

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instinct

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the ma

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm wi

 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We kept our group

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.

We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We kept our group small as

 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We we

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.

 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We were able to harness this f

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We were able to harness this from then on to protect us

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We were able to harness this from then on to protect us from hostile aliens from then on. In the end wha

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We were able to harness this from then on to protect us from hostile aliens from then on. In the end what they did to our planet

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 
The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We were able to harness this from then on to protect us from hostile aliens from then on. In the end what they did to our planet merely helped us survive. Eve

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

There were only 8 of us left. The last blast from the aliens destroyed much of the life on earth and the ones who were left were stranded on an island. e were all that was left to carry on the human race.
 The legend of the power called Mana was still shared but we thought it was gone forever. Then one by one, we began to see signs of that power returning. I looked in the mirror one morning and saw that I was glowing. I had no idea what was going on. I shared this with the other 7 and we found that it was all of us. "What could this mean?" I wondered.
We decided that we needed to get together and figure out what was going on.
 We gathered in a cave not far from where we lived. We thought maybe if we tried to glow together in the same space it would help us figure out what was going on and why we were glowing. So we all stood in this dark cave for nearly an hour and then slowly, one by one, we all began to glow in the dark, illuminating the cave. The glow grew stronger and brighter. There were bats in the cave and they all flew away from the bright light that we were producing. At that moment, we felt like we were glowing with the power of the Mana once again. When we stepped out of the cave, we were all glowing and continuing to glow brighter and stronger. 

The next day one by one, it was like we all remembered our instincts. This glowing WAS the Mana! and we knew we were invincible to harm with it. We were able to harness this from then on to protect us from hostile aliens w. In the end what they did to our planet merely helped us survive. Even if it was only 8 of us.
